name: Avontage

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: avon tage
des:
Join a community of AZ small business owners, freelancers, entrepreneurs, creatives, and influencers to connect and collaborate to grow your business without spending any money. Sell or trade your offers online in 15 mins.
The Advantages of Avontage are:
You pay for marketing with your services, instead of your cash.
You gain high-quality and like-minded clients and repeat customers
You recoup your perishable and excess capacities, such as slow times, empty seats, and unbooked hours.
Hence, reducing the need for deep discounting your services.
Which results in increased profits!

...all that with a simple push of a button
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
